languages.text: "Вот как?" {n}Даже раненным Фелек Орселлио держится непоколебимо.{/n} "Я так не думаю. Вы не можете меня заставить — лишь убить. Однако это совсем не то, чего желает ваше сердце, не так ли? Быть может... Быть может мы сможем друг другу помочь и прийти к более выгодному соглашению".

traits.locale_text: "Вот как?" {n}Даже раненным Фелек Орселлио держится непоколебимо.{/n} "Я так не думаю. Вы не можете меня заставить — лишь убить. Однако это совсем не то, чего желает ваше сердце, не так ли? Быть может... Быть может мы сможем друг другу помочь и прийти к более выгодному соглашению".

languages.text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."
languages.original_text: "Вот как?" {n}Даже раненным Фелек Орселлио держится непоколебимо.{/n} "Я так не думаю. Вы не можете меня заставить — лишь убить. Однако это совсем не то, чего желает ваше сердце, не так ли? Быть может... Быть может мы сможем друг другу помочь и прийти к более выгодному соглашению".

traits.locale_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains unperturbed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

"Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains unperturbed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

"Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

"Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

"Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

"Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

languages.text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Selbst verwundet behält Felek Orsellio noch die Fassung.{/n} "Das glaube ich nicht. Ihr könnt mich nicht zwingen, Ihr könnt nur meinem Leben ein Ende bereiten. Doch das ist nicht Euer Herz Begehr, nicht wahr? Vielleicht ... Vielleicht können wir einander helfen und eine nützlichere Übereinkunft treffen."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Tatsächlich?" {n}Selbst verwundet behält Felek Orsellio noch die Fassung.{/n} "Das glaube ich nicht. Ihr könnt mich nicht zwingen, Ihr könnt nur meinem Leben ein Ende bereiten. Doch das ist nicht Euer Herz Begehr, nicht wahr? Vielleicht ... Vielleicht können wir einander helfen und eine nützlichere Übereinkunft treffen."

languages.text: « Vraiment ? » {n}demande Felek Orsellio qui, même blessé, garde son calme.{/n} « Je ne crois pas. Vous ne pouvez pas me forcer, seulement mettre un terme à ma vie. Mais tel n'est pas votre souhait, n'est-ce pas ? Alors, peut-être... peut-être pouvons-nous nous entraider et trouver un accord qui nous soit mutuellement bénéfique. »
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: « Vraiment ? » {n}demande Felek Orsellio qui, même blessé, garde son calme.{/n} « Je ne crois pas. Vous ne pouvez pas me forcer, seulement mettre un terme à ma vie. Mais tel n'est pas votre souhait, n'est-ce pas ? Alors, peut-être... peut-être pouvons-nous nous entraider et trouver un accord qui nous soit mutuellement bénéfique. »

languages.text: “真的是这样吗？”{n}费雷克·奥赛罗尽管受了伤，但依然镇定自若。{/n}“恐怕我并不这么认为。您无法强迫我为您效力，或许您可以杀了我，但这并不是您的愿望，没错吧？或许……或许我们可以互相帮助，达成更合适的协议。”
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: “真的是这样吗？”{n}费雷克·奥塞罗尽管受了伤，但依然镇定自若。{/n}“恐怕我并不这么认为。您无法强迫我为您效力，或许您可以杀了我，但这并不是您的愿望，没错吧？或许……或许我们可以互相帮助，达成更合适的协议。”

languages.text: 「本当かな？」{n}怪我を負っても、フェレック・オーセリオは冷静なままだ。{/n}「違うだろう。私を従わせることはできない。つまり、殺すしかない。だが、それはあなたの真の願いではないだろう？多分…おそらく、我々は互いに手を取り合い、もっと有益な協力関係を結べる」
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: 「そうか？」{n}怪我を負っても、フェレック・オーセリオは冷静なままだ。{/n}「私はそうは思わない。私に強要することは不可能だ。この命を終わらせるしかない。だが、それはあなたの真の願いではないだろう？多分…おそらく、互いに手を取り合って、もっと互いに良い協力関係を結べる」
「本当かな？」{n}怪我を負っても、フェレック・オーセリオは冷静なままだ。{/n}「違うだろう。私を従わせることはできない。つまり、殺すしかない。だが、それはあなたの真の願いではないだろう？多分…おそらく、我々は互いに手を取り合い、もっと有益な協力関係を結べる」

languages.text: «¿De verdad?». {n}A pesar de sus heridas, Felek Orsellio conserva la compostura.{/n} «Pues creo que no. No puede obligarme, solo matarme. Pero no ha venido a eso, ¿verdad? Tal vez... Tal vez podamos ayudarnos mutuamente y llegar a un acuerdo mutuamente beneficioso».
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: «¿De verdad?». {n}A pesar de sus heridas, Felek Orsellio conserva la compostura.{/n} «Pues creo que no. No puede obligarme, solo matarme. Pero no ha venido a eso, ¿verdad? Tal vez... Tal vez podamos ayudarnos mutuamente y llegar a un acuerdo mutuamente beneficioso».

languages.text: "Bak sen..." {n}Felek Orsellio, yaralı olsa da sakinliğinden ödün vermiyor.{/n} "O işler öyle yürümüyor. Beni zorla götüremezsin, en fazla canımı alırsın. Gerçi öyle bir niyetin de yok, belli. Aslında... Birbirimize yardım etsek orta yolu buluruz gibime geliyor."
languages.original_text: "Is that so?" {n}Even wounded, Felek Orsellio remains composed.{/n} "I do not think so. You cannot force me, you can only end my life. But this is not your heart's desire, is it? Perhaps... Perhaps, we can help one another and reach a more beneficial agreement."

traits.locale_text: "Bak sen..." {n}Felek Orsellio, yaralı olsa da sakinliğinden ödün vermiyor.{/n} "O işler öyle yürümüyor. Beni zorla götüremezsin, en fazla canımı alırsın. Gerçi öyle bir niyetin de yok, belli. Aslında... Birbirimize yardım etsek orta yolu buluruz gibime geliyor."
